entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Periods of light snow beginning near midnight. Wind east 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Fog patches developing after midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023
